actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that the President exercise his authority under the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 by freezing retail food prices and that the President establish a commission to investigate the cost and availability of food.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House that the President exercise his authority under the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 by freezing retail food prices and that the President establish a commission to investigate the cost and availability of food.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that the President exercise his authority under the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 by freezing retail food prices and that the President establish a commission to investigate the cost and availability of food.
